attributes.action: We want Centro to keep its direct bus service from Solihull to Heartlands hospital
attributes.additional_details: Centro are considering scrapping the direct bus route from Solihull to Heartlands hospital. This service is literally a lifeline for many people in Solihull, an expanding town. With more NHS services being shifted from Solihull to Heartlands the retention of a direct bus service is crucial and we want all possible pressure put on the bus company to keep it going
